mama me lipi tika liyanna hethuwunu karunu mul lipiyen dakkane neda ........meka wishala karmanthayak kiwuwoth hari aththatama lesi na mama mulinma mama kiwuwane meka patan gaththa widiha neda ...........eeta passe ape ratata paththara aawa................eka wadi kalayak thibune na eeta passe eka sanyuktha thatiya aawa ..........pulu pulu wan aya eeka horen balanna gaththa eeta passe thamayi me antharjalayata wade giye eken katawath nodana thamanta balanda ooni de balanda puluwan wuna ada wenakota meka sarala nathi thathwayata pathwela ........ee sarala nathi de ape rate witharak nathara karana eka echchara lesi na ada antharjala bhawitha karana aya me nilchithrapata hoyana ganan minum thamayi me........

boga ha saththwa eekakawala nishpadana thaththwa - boga walin labaganna aswanu pa්ramanaya - sathungen labaganna nishpadana (kiri, biththara) pa්ramanaya mese oba satahan karagaththa thorathuru walata anuwa obe gewaththe paladayithawaya nanwima sambandhayen athi pa්radhana gatalu ehemath nathnam gewaththen uparima pa්rayojana labimata badha karana karunu handunaganna oona eelangata awashyathawaya anuwa ema gataluwalata pa්ramukhathwaya labena widiyata pelagaswanna .idiriyedi oba gewaththen labaganna balaporoththu wana dewal pahatha paridi wenna puluwan - pawule edineda poshana awashyathawayan sapayima - amathara aadayam ipayima idiriyedi oba gewaththen labaganna balaporoththu wana dewal pahatha paridi wenna puluwan - gewaththe nipadawana dewalwala wiwidhathwayak athi kirima - awurudda purama aahara labagatha haki bawata (aahara surakshithabhawayata* path kirima - paladawa adu gaswal wala paladawa wadi kirima - awurudda purama aahara labagatha haki bawata (aahara surakshithabhawayata)path kirima - wisithuru pala, wathu boga saha apanayana boga wala thawan athi kirima - hanikara krumi sathun (palibodha) saha wal palati mardanaya kirima - bhumiya uparima pa්rayojana labena widiyata yoda ganima - neth sith pinawana widiyata watapitawa sakas kirima (bhumi alankaranaya) me aramunu itukara ganna badhawana gatalu wisanda ganimata kalpanakariwa gewaththa salasum karanna oona .wisheshayenma pahatha sandahan karunu gana salakilimathwima wadagath wenawa - pa්radeshaye deshagunika ha panshu thaththwa - idame krushikarmika wibhawaya (hakiyawa)ha nidahase labena sampath (hirueliya, warshawa) - waya kala haki pawule sha්ramaya, kalaya, mudala me karunuu anuwa obe gewaththa salasum kara sanwardhanaya karanna yodaganna thakshanika upaka්rama wenas wiya yuthu wenawa.mewa ithama sarala wennath puluwan.
